archimate:Capability.name: 05. Ability to support service interoperability. Ability to implement a part of the broker pattern. Ability to convert from the service description to service calls supported by the platform (in the case of a WSDL web service, the conversion from WSDL service description to the service invocation). Ability to convert at runtime into a standards-compliant form for consumption by standards-compliant service consumers on both input and output. Ability to convert from the standards-compliant form to the form acceptable to the underlying Solution Component which satisfies the serviceâ€™s functional capability on both input and output. Ability to enforce policies and access control during service binding
